name: Hyponatremia Simulator
description:
Virtual patient simulation with integrated generative AI for physicians and other providers learning to manage hyponatremia. 

JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, MongoBD, Express, OpenAI

name: RenalConsults.com
description:
Note generator with integrated generative AI for acute kidney injury consults in hospitalized patients. 

JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, MongoBD, Express, OpenAI

name: KidneyCalc.org
description:
Evidence-based risk calculator site for acute kidney injury. 


JavaScript, HTML, CSS

name: CRRT Simulation
description:
Virtual patient simulation for physicians and other providers learning to manage continuous renal replacement therapy in critically ill patients. 

JavaScript, HTML, CSS

name: Wavelength: EMR
description:
EMR system with provider login linked to Google account. Create a patient discharge summary from all prior notes using generative AI.

 MongoDB, ExpressJS, Node.js, OpenAI

name: RenalPrimers.com
description:
Website created for internal medicine residents to learn key concepts in nephrology through cases and interactive animations.

 JavaScript, HTML, CSS

name: NEJM Group: COVID-19 Rx Treatment Simulations
description:
Product of NEJM Group. Four simulations focused on care of inpatients with COVID-19.

 Contributed to simulation content

name: COVID-19 Primer
description:
Interactive virtual patient simulation that I created in April, 2020 focused on care of inpatients with COVID-19. Posted on NEJM website and with thousands of users globally. 

 Adobe Animate, JavaScript

name: COVID-19 Primer: Part II
description:
Follow up part II of the initial interactive virtual patient simulation focused on critically ill patients with COVID-19.

 Adobe Animate, JavaScript
